verses.verse: But it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as soon as <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent,<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>telling<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> – that is, <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> –

that <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1955>Hoshaiah,<s%> and <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2086>arrogant<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> "You are <S%H1696>telling<s%> a <S%H8267>lie!<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H559>say,<s%> 'You are not to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>reside<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%>';

but <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%> is <S%H5496>inciting<s%> you against us to <S%H5414>give<s%> us over into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> so they may <S%H4191>put<s%> us to <S%H4191>death<s%> or <S%H1540>exile<s%> us to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%> "

So <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> did not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> so as to <S%H3427>stay<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

But <S%H3076>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7143>Kareah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>commanders<s%> of the <S%H2428>forces<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> they had been <S%H5080>driven<s%> <S%H5080>away,<s%> in order to <S%H1481>reside<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> –

the <S%H1397>men,<s%> the <S%H802>women,<s%> the <S%H2945>children,<s%> the king's <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> that <S%H5018>Nebuzaradan<s%> the <S%H9538>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard<s%> had <S%H5117>left<s%> with <S%H9072>Gedaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> and <S%H1121>grandson<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> together with <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%> –

and they <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> (for they did not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>) and <S%H935>went<s%> in as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H8471>Tahpanhes.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H376>[some<s%>] <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in your <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H2934>hide<s%> them in the <S%H4423>mortar<s%> in the <S%H4404>brick<s%> [terrace] <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H1004>palace<s%> in <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of some [of the] <S%H3064>Jews;<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>get<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and I am going to <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> [right] <S%H4605>over<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> that I have <S%H2934>hidden;<s%> and he will <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H8237>canopy<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

"He will also <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> those <S%H834>who<s%> are [meant] for <S%H4194>death<s%> [will be given over] to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and those for <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and those for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

"And I shall <S%H3341>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> to the <S%H1004>temples<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he will <S%H8313>burn<s%> them and <S%H7617>take<s%> them <S%H7617>captive.<s%> So he will <S%H5844>wrap<s%> <S%H5844>himself<s%> with the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5844>wraps<s%> <S%H5844>himself<s%> with his <S%H899>garment,<s%> and he will <S%H3318>depart<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7965>safely.<s%>

"He will also <S%H7665>shatter<s%> the <S%H4676>obelisks<s%> of <S%H1053>Heliopolis,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H1004>temples<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> he will <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>"' "
